official-title.#text:
To prohibit the awarding of a contract or
		  grant in excess of the simplified acquisition threshold unless the prospective
		  contractor or grantee certifies in writing to the agency awarding the contract
		  or grant that the contractor or grantee has no seriously delinquent tax debts,
		  and for other purposes.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

It is the policy of the
			 United States Government that no Government contracts or grants should be
			 awarded to individuals or companies with seriously delinquent Federal tax
			 debts.
